title: i always have Last Stand whenever i have Absolute Focus
body: so that way when im not doing extra dmg, im doing extra dmg

replies.body: Or, from another perspective, whenever you're doing extra damage, you're not doing extra damage.
The old story of pessimism versus optimism
Perhaps not the best idea since specializing is always rewarded more, but this sounds hilarious at least and made me smile.

LEARN HOW THIS MAN GOT TO DIAMOND 1 IN 6 DAYS!

CHALLENGERS HATE HIM!!!!
I know this is a joke, but its been kind of that way. ''When im not dealing extra damage, im dealing extra damage.''
Unless I want more sustain stuff with my Absolute Focus, I'll do this too. I haven't really been using AF much however. I'm more of a Transcendence main.
